type.name: org.gradle.plugin.repository.PluginRepositoriesSpec
type.description:
* Used to declare {@link org.gradle.plugin.repository.PluginRepository} instances. *

* Plugin repositories added via this interface will used to resolve plugins specified * in the plugins {} block.

method.name: gradlePluginPortal
method.description: * Adds the Gradle Plugin Portal (plugins.gradle.org) as a plugin repository. * @return The added repository. * @throws IllegalArgumentException if called more than once.

method.name: ivy
method.description: * Adds and configures an {@link IvyPluginRepository}. * * @param action The action to use to configure the repository. * @return the added repository.

method.name: maven
method.description: * Adds and configures a {@link MavenPluginRepository}. * * @param action The action to use to configure the repository. * @return The added repository.
